articles.description: Now that Christmas Day is behind us, health leaders say a more dangerous time is just ahead. New Year’s Eve when gatherings could spread COVID-19. They fear that people are going to let down their guard and go celebrate with strangers and other people o…

articles.title: 'Club Kid' Killer Michael Alig Dies; Overdose Suspected - Snopes.com
